Come out to our November 14th event to create your own holiday design in R to send to your friends and families this holiday season to hear a great talk! 


This meeting will include a group coding event (we're making holiday cards! :D ) and a presentation from a [Christine Zhang](http://underthecurve.github.io/bylines/) who works as a Data Journalist at the [Baltimore Sun](https://twitter.com/baltimoresun) and [Baltimore Sun Data Visualization team](https://twitter.com/baltsundata) to discuss how she uses R in her jobs and examples of projects she works on!

Visit our [Meetup](https://www.meetup.com/rladies-baltimore/events/254235117/) page for more details and to RSVP.

**Details on the location**:

Date: Wednesday, November 14, 2018

Time: 12:00-1:30pm

Location: 
Johns Hopkins School of Public Health
615 N. Wolfe Street
Baltimore, MD 21205
(Room W3008 -- 3rd floor)
